column1: During a difficult year like 2020 giving thanks for what we have is even more important. God bless and Happy Thanksgiving! https://t.co/HDQr6tqhi9

Rural health care faces too many challenges normally and even more during the COVID crisis. Grateful the House passed @JoaquinCastrotx and my legislation H.Res. 349 which reaffirms America's commitment to our alliance with Japan. Our shared democratic values and principles are an example to the rest of the world.

Nearly one in five Americans or 62 million people live in rural America. Today on National Rural Health Day we reflect on the unique challenges we face and the importance of rural communities maintaining access to quality care. https://t.co/JhjlV21f6i

Last week I hosted a series of Small Business & Community Roundtables where we discussed adapting to the current environment while taking steps to fight COVID-19. My column here: https://t.co/eg6Izt4t51

This year marked the 75th anniversary of the end of World War II. In a war filled with terror and untold suffering American soldiers were a shining light of hope liberty and freedom. Thank you to everyone who has put their life on the line for our freedom! #VeteransDay https://t.co/3dsEj7rUBk

This Wednesday let us celebrate our veterans together as a nation. My column here: https://t.co/SUMtApgMNQ

Everyone’s vote matters and should be counted. We must ensure every vote is authentic timely and legal. I’m concerned about the ballot-counting patterns that lack transparency and accountability. It’s inexcusable for ballot-counting locations to exclude Republican observers.

Congratulations to our newest Supreme Court Justice Amy Coney Barrett! Her principled interpretation of the law and our constitution as originally written will serve our nation well for years to come.

Great news from the @USDA and @USTradeRep report on ag trade with China. As @realdonaldtrump said China is complying with our deal. Beef exports in 2020 alone are already 3x as much as all of 2017! https://t.co/WuxulRewUt
Andrea and I are saddened to hear about the passing of Senator Dave Karnes. He will be remembered for his service to our great state and will be missed. Our prayers are with his family.

@realDonaldTrump and @FLOTUS are in Andrea’s and my prayers. We wish them a full and speedy recovery.
